{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WCR-G54 |revision= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1605AMC-15G |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8216 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}[http://network.pconline.com.cn/pingce/0804/1260226_2.html Internal shots], RAM quoted as 8MB
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=63843 On the DD-WRT forums]
The default SSID (per the above PCOnline link) appears to be the router MAC. The sample MAC provided in the PCOnline link above is 001D732D023D (OUI 00:1D:73).
